description:

No matter what you're looking for, Temu has you covered, including fashion, home decor, handmade crafts, beauty & cosmetics, clothing, shoes, and more.

Bash is home to 500+ of your most-loved brands. Featuring your favourite names in fashion, home, sports and tech - and a whole lot more for you to explore.

Packed with smart features, the Bash app creates a seamless shopping experience both in-store and online. Use the Wallet to manage your account, buy airtime/data, and purchase lifestyle vouchers, or check real-time availability with the Stock Locator.

It's shopping simplified.

And the best part? We're constantly improving thanks to our growing community on @friendsofbash. When you let us know what you love and what you want, it lets us know what to work on to ensure Bash is the best for you.

That's what we call the power of together.

Comprehensive

Quickly search, get product details, read reviews and purchase millions of products available from Amazon and other merchants.

Convenient
Sign in with your existing Amazon account to access your basket, payment and shipping options. No need to create a new account to manage your 1-Click settings and wish lists, track your orders and use your Prime membership benefits. Shop just as you do on the web.

Fast
Compare prices and check availability instantly by scanning a barcode, snapping a picture or typing your search. 

Secure
All purchases are routed through Amazon's secure servers.

Universal
Shop Amazon.co.uk, Amazon.de, Amazon.es, Amazon.fr, Amazon.com, Amazon.it, Amazon.cn or Amazon.co.jp, Amazon.sg from a single app.

For customers located within the European Union, United Kingdom or Brazil: By using this app, you agree to Amazon’s Conditions of Use applicable for your country. Please also see the applicable Privacy Notice, Cookies Notice and Interest-Based Ads Notice for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.
 
For all other customers: By using this app, you agree to the applicable Amazon Conditions of Use (e.g. www.amazon.com/conditionsofuse) and Privacy Notice (e.g. www.amazon.com/privacy) for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.

SHEIN is an affordable online shopping platform offering rich items and trendy goods. Discovering pretty items, trying new things and sharing with others,  SHEIN is dedicated to meet all your needs in life and works as your one-stop shopping destination! We take pride in satisfying our customers and bringing them the best shopping experience.

Inspire yourself with SHEIN right now!

Contact us:

The app needs the following access permissions when it is running on your device:

-	Optional permission(s):

o	Notification: it will allow us to send push notifications to your device.

o	Camera: the camera function is required when you need to capture photos and videos and upload them to the app.

o	Photo and video: it will enable you to upload photos and videos from your device to the app.

o	Location: where the relevant service is available, it enables location based services on your device. 
(This is not used in Korea.)

o	Calendar: it enables you to sync the SHEIN LIVE events to your device calendar. 

o	Microphone: when you try to capture videos using Camera function, the app will also need the microphone access permission to capture the voice. 

※ Even if you do not grant optional access permissions, you can still use SHEIN service, except for the functions related to those permissions.

Get the Woolworths app and enjoy quality and difference whenever, wherever you need it.

It’s everything you’ve come to expect from South Africa’s best-loved retailer, and there’s so much more to come.

Shop on the go
Browse, search and shop fashion, beauty, homeware and food wherever you are, and choose the delivery option that works for you:

Standard delivery: Choose your date and time and we’ll deliver to your door. 

Click and Collect: Shop Woolies food and collect it from a Woolies store when and where it’s convenient for you.

Dash Delivery: Shop Woolies food and get your order delivered fast, fresh and same day!

Stay a step ahead
Turn on push notifications to be the first to know about exclusive offers and promotions, and keep connected with messages and news in your app inbox.

Stay inspired
Get the latest style trends and mouth-watering recipes as soon as you open the app.

Ratings and reviews
Find out what customers are saying about their recent purchases and share your thoughts with our Woolies community.

Virtual try on
Try before you buy and get the latest, and best, look with our virtual try on service.  Available on selected beauty products using your device’s camera and remember to smile for that selfie! 

Scan a product 
Get instant product info when you scan a product in a store or at home.  Add to your basket for quick and easy shopping.

Find in store
Need something special right now?  Our app can tell you what we have in stock at all your nearest stores, so you can plan your shopping journey better than ever and be sure to get what you need.

.Shopping list
Add any products to your in-app shopping list while you’re browsing. It’s easy to use and so convenient when you’re on the go. 


Find your store
Use our store locator to find your nearest store, its contact details and opening hours. iOS users, open directions to your chosen store in Apple Maps.

Check your account
Woolies card holders, check your account balance, available funds, next payment date, and your last 20 transactions on the go! You can also view your full statement and make your payment wherever you are.

Shop with your virtual store card
Whether you’ve left your store card at home or you’re waiting for your new card to be delivered, you can use your Woolies Virtual Store Card in our app.

Be secure
Can’t find your Woolies store card but think you might? Freeze it in our app so no one can use it. Definitely lost your card or it’s been stolen? Block it and arrange a replacement in our app. 

Get funds
You can apply for a store card, credit card, a loan or a credit limit increase straight from the app! Remember, if you have a Woolworths Personal Loan, you can request funds to be transferred into your account at any time.

Get rewarded
Get personalised WRewards virtual card and vouchers in the app. Cashiers will scan the digital WRewards card and vouchers on your phone at checkout. You can also check your tier status, WRewards savings, and your next tier goal.

Easy log in
Use the same sign in details for our website and app. 

Get in touch
You’ll find our contact details, email address and FAQs in the app. You can chat to our Financial Services team direct from the app.

Shop online with Takealot, South Africa’s #1 shopping app and get your order delivered to your door with safe, contactless delivery, or collect at a Takealot Pickup Point at a time and place that is convenient to you! 

Find amazing savings on everyday essentials, groceries, sports equipment, body and hair care, tech and more! Get everything you need delivered from one shopping app.

Buy great products at great prices through one simple, secure online shopping experience. Find great deals on pet care, toiletries and get your groceries delivered safely and securely.

Browse millions of products across 28 departments from household cleaning, baby care, and coffee essentials to electronics, books, gaming and first aid - plus much, much more. Shop around and save items you want to custom lists for later. Essentials for mom and baby are available at our every day low prices.

Shop for kids toys like Lego, Fisher Price and Barbie. Or, shop for the whole family and buy board games for hours of fun!

Order on your mobile in less than a minute, with easy, safe payment options, including credit, debit and Instant EFT. Takealot lets you shop securely, with biometric face or thumbprint ID.

Unless your password is “password”, you’re going to love this nifty new login method. Simply use fingerprint or facial recognition to quickly and easily start shopping on SA’s #1 online shopping app.

Get your goodies delivered to your door anywhere in South Africa, even on weekends. Deliveries are contact-free, so simply pick up the package when it’s dropped off at your doorstep.

Please note: certain products, such as large appliances, are not eligible for collection. These products must be delivered to a home or business address.

We promise safe, reliable touchless delivery on every order – free when you spend over R650 – and hassle-free returns if something isn’t right. T&Cs apply.

Takealot: Shop Anything You Can Imagine.
Download now to get everything you like to buy, delivered right to your door!

TAKEALOT FEATURES:

SALES & DISCOUNTS
• Find great deals on everyday essentials!
• Pet care, vitamins, cleaning supplies, groceries, tech, mom and baby, beauty & much more

ONLINE SHOPPING MADE EASY
• Browse, search and buy millions of Takealot products across 28 departments any time, anywhere
• Easy, safe payment options including Instant EFT, credit & debit cards and more
• Send and share links to products via email, SMS, Facebook, Twitter and more
• Secure login with face or thumbprint ID biometrics

SECURE DELIVERY
• Fast & reliable delivery to your door, anywhere in South Africa
• Contactless delivery
• FREE SHIPPING & COLLECTIONS when you spend R650 or more
• Shop and track your order every step of the way, from checkout to your front door, right from the app
• Hassle-free returns if something isn’t right

GREAT DEALS
• Price-check items you see in stores using our barcode scanner to find the best deal
• Filter deals by department

MILLIONS OF PRODUCTS
Browse and buy unbeatable deals in:
• Electronics
• Mobile, Cellular & GPS
• Cameras
• Home, Furniture & Appliances
• Books and eBooks
• Health & Wellness
• Beauty & Makeup
• Medicine
• Household Cleaning
• Mom & Baby
• Office & Stationery
• Pet Supplies
• Groceries
• Toiletries
• Home fitness
• Kitchenware
• Coffee essentials
• Body & Hair Care
• And more!

Shop for anything you can imagine and get it from your fingertips to your front door. Download the takealot.com mobile app today and find everything you need in one place!

Sixty60 is South Africa’s #1 delivery service with over 5-million app downloads.

GROCERIES & SO MUCH MORE!
Sixty60’s your one-stop-shop for daily Checkers & Shoprite groceries and bigger stuff from Checkers Hyper – like TVs, braais, camping gear, pool cleaners, prams and more.

THE EASIEST WAY TO SHOP!
Make everyday shopping effortless with our easy-to-use app that allows you to shop in as little as 60 seconds, whenever you want, from wherever you are.

THE FASTEST WAY TO GET IT!
Whether it’s your daily groceries delivered in 60 minutes or bigger stuff from Checkers Hyper delivered on the same day within a 60-minute time slot... No one will get it to you faster than us.

OUR FAMOUSLY LOW PRICES!
With Sixty60 you get the exact same prices and Xtra Savings deals you’d find in-store, delivered.

ENJOY UNLIMITED FREE DELIVERIES WITH XTRA SAVINGS PLUS!
Sign up for Xtra Savings Plus for just R99 per month for unlimited free deliveries. You’ll also get double the personalised deals plus 10% off one in-store shop per month.

SHOPRITE SIXTY60 IS HERE!
Use the Checkers Sixty60 app to get Shoprite groceries delivered fast! Available in selected areas of SA.

We accept payment via CVV-enabled Visa and Mastercard cards. We now also accept CVV-enabled RCS cards as an added payment method.

NEED HELP?
Contact our Help Centre on 0800 00 6060. Our team’s available from 8am to 8pm daily. For more info visit www.checkers.co.za.

developer: Pick n Pay Retailers PTY LTD
description:
Welcome to the easiest way to shop with Pick n Pay.
 
Experience shopping like never before with our best app yet. Shop over 30 000 products across a wide range of categories including groceries, homeware, electronics, and more.
 
Enjoy exclusive deals, in-store pricing, Smart Shopper rewards, and fast delivery right to your doorstep. Whether you need groceries, homeware, or more, Pick n Pay asap! & Smart Shopper makes shopping easier than ever. Shop from the comfort of your home with super-fast delivery in just 60 minutes, smart AI search, and precise order tracking.
 
YOUR ONE-STOP GROCERY SHOP
 
From fresh fruit and veggies, dairy, frozen food, pantry staples, and home appliances, to pet care, electronics, health products, and even load shedding essentials, you’ll find over 30,000 products from all your favourite brands. Plus, enjoy alcohol delivery including liquor and wine.
 
ALL YOUR FAVOURITE BRANDS AT YOUR FINGERTIPS
 
Browse top brands like Nestlé, Coca-Cola, Pampers, and Simba. Whether it’s baby products, coffee, cheese, wine, or ready-made meals, you’ll find everything you need in one place. If it’s in-store, it’s on the app.
 
FRESH & FAST DELIVERY WITHOUT LEAVING HOME
 
Enjoy fresh, fast deliveries to over 400 destinations across South Africa, with orders sent from your nearest store. Our goal is to get your order to your door as quickly as possible, delivered in as little as 60 minutes for just R35 per order. With smart search tools, easy cart additions, and location services, you can shop, pay, and track your order with ease.
 
EARN AND SPEND YOUR SMART SHOPPER POINTS
 
Link your Smart Shopper card to the app and earn points on every order. You can now spend your Smart Shopper points on the app too.
 
BONUS POINTS AT OUR FEATURED PARTNERS
 
Earn Smart Shopper points when shopping at our featured partners like TymeBank, Netflorist, BP, and Europcar, as well as through programs like Momentum Multiply, Absa Rewards, and Standard Bank UCount Rewards.
 
EARN EBUCKS
 
Get up to 30% back in eBucks on every order.
 
EASY PAYMENT AND ORDERING
 
With quick and simple payment options, finishing your order is a breeze. Your shopper will carefully select your items, and a driver will deliver your order straight to your door. Get live updates on your order status through notifications.
 
MORE REWARDS WITH PICK N PAY CLUBS
 
Join our Pick n Pay Clubs and enjoy exclusive deals and competitions. From the Pick n Pay Wine Club to the Baby Club and Coffee Club, get additional savings, member-only offers, and even triple points on select products.
 
TOP-UP, DIGITAL RECEIPTS & MORE
 
Quickly top up airtime and data with prepaid options, and enjoy digital receipts sent straight to your inbox for easier tracking. No more paper clutter!
 
THE SMARTER WAY TO SHOP
 
The app offers a simpler, smarter way to shop. Get instant savings, personalised discounts, and rewards for every purchase. It’s your go-to app for savings, loyalty points, and hassle-free shopping!
 
GET STARTED NOW
 
Download the Pick n Pay asap! & Smart Shopper app today to unlock your rewards, and start enjoying easy, fast, and affordable shopping. Whether you're stocking up on groceries, getting essentials for home, or treating yourself to something special, Pick n Pay has you covered.

Sneakers to heels.

Smart to casual.

Saturday night to Sunday morning.

Workplace to workout.

Beach day to birthday.

Head to toe.

And floor to ceiling.

Everything you need to live superb.

Get R400 OFF your first order with code FIRSTBUY.
Free returns and exchanges.

Looking for a shopping experience that’s exciting, affordable, and refreshingly unpredictable? OneDayOnly is your go-to online shopping destination, offering BIG brand deals up to 80% OFF, with new deals every 24 hours! Our shopping app brings you unbeatable prices on everything from fashion to fitness gear, homeware to tech, and toys to travel must-haves.

Every single day, you’ll discover something new to add to your cart. Whether you’re doing some casual shopping or hunting down specific products, you’ll love the endless possibilities that come with our ever-changing deal lineup. We’ve made shopping more thrilling than ever.

Why choose OneDayOnly for your online shopping?

- Daily shopping deals that expire in 24 hours – get them before they’re gone

- Extra Time Deals for those can’t-miss bargains you just need a little more time for

- Lunchtime deals that drop daily at 1pm – limited time, limited quantity

- Regular shopping events, surprise campaigns, competitions and flash sales

- Easy category filters to streamline your shopping experience

- Push notifications so you never miss a shopping drop

- Exclusive shopping updates via our proudly South African daily newsletter

This is more than just a shopping app, it’s a new way to shop every day. With our clever mix of fun, humour, and great value, OneDayOnly brings a fresh spin to mobile shopping in South Africa. It’s spontaneous, it’s rewarding, and it’s always worth checking in.

Have questions about your order or need help with the app? Our friendly customer support team is here to make sure your shopping journey runs smoothly from start to finish.

Download the OneDayOnly app now and transform the way you shop. From home to on-the-go, from midday sales to midnight scrolls, there’s never a dull moment in your daily shopping routine.

OneDayOnly – your favourite online shopping app, reimagined.

Makro Online Shopping App
Trusted by thousands of customers, the Makro online shopping app offers great deals on everything you need. Explore a wide range of products across all departments and enjoy a fast, convenient shopping experience.

Shop Smart & Save More
Makro is your one-stop shop for electronics, groceries, liquor, home essentials, and much more. With our easy-to-use design, finding your essentials is a seamless experience, saving you time and effort.

Convenient Shopping Anytime, Anywhere
Use your existing Makro account or easily create a new one to shop your favourites at your convenience. Enjoy free delivery on orders over R500 or choose Next Day Pickup for ultimate flexibility.

Explore Seasonal Promotions & More4Less
Stock up on your everyday essentials without breaking the bank by taking advantage of great seasonal specials and ongoing promotions.

Safe and Secure Payment Options
Shop confidently with a variety of secure payment options, including credit card, debit card, and EFT. The Makro Shopping App ensures a safe and hassle-free online shopping experience.

Black Friday starts here — score huge deals on the AliExpress app right now. AliExpress brings millions of items across fashion, electronics, home, beauty and more, all in one easy app so you can grab Black Friday discounts, flash sales and app-only coupons.

Find top brands, unique finds and everyday essentials at great prices. Read honest buyer reviews, compare sellers, and use smart search and filters to find exactly what you want. With AliExpress you get personalized recommendations, saved wishlists, price-drop alerts and curated collections tailored to your tastes.

We make shopping safe and simple. AliExpress protects your purchase with secure payments, buyer protection and easy returns. Track orders in real time, get delivery updates, and choose fast shipping options when you need items quickly. Chat with sellers or our support team right from the app.

Don’t miss limited-time Black Friday deals, exclusive app offers and flash events — AliExpress updates promotions constantly so you can save more. Whether you’re hunting for gifts, seasonal styles, or must-have gadgets, AliExpress puts endless choice and value in your pocket.

Download the AliExpress app today, join millions of shoppers, and enjoy worry-free shopping during Black Friday and all year round. Great finds and huge savings are just a tap away on AliExpress.

developer: Hangzhou Alibaba International Information Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
What is Alibaba.com?
Alibaba.com is one of the world’s leading B2B ecommerce marketplaces. Our app allows you to source products from global suppliers, all from the convenience of your mobile device.

Purchase with confidence
Our Trade Assurance service protects your orders and payments on the platform, letting you purchase securely and conveniently with extended support.

Customizable products
Meet suppliers with years of customization and order fulfillment experience for sellers on Amazon, eBay, Wish, Etsy, Mercari, Lazada, and more.

Easy sourcing
Discover millions of ready-to-ship products in every industry category. Tell suppliers what you need and get quotes quickly with Request for Quotation services.

Fast shipping
Alibaba.com partners with major freight forwarders to provide land, sea, and air shipping solutions with on-time delivery services, end-to-end tracking, and competitive prices.

Livestreams and factory tours
Interact with manufacturers in real-time via product demos and tours of manufacturing facilities, providing insight and oversight on how your products are made.

Popular categories and trade shows
Source a wide range of popular items – from trending consumer goods to raw materials – and join our annual trade shows for niche product highlights and discounts.

Quality control
Choose Alibaba.com Production Monitoring and Inspection Services to reduce production delay and quality risks.

Discounts and promotions
Unlock new discounts and promotions from featured manufacturers and suppliers.

Stay updated
Use the Alibaba.com app to stay up to date on new products and promotions from your favorite suppliers.

Language and currency support
Alibaba.com supports 16 languages and 140 local currencies. Use our real-time translator to communicate with sellers in your mother tongue.

The Nike App is your personal guide to all things Nike. ​​Become a Member ​​​and​​ get​​ exclusive ​access ​to ​the latest from Nike and Jordan. Shop innovative sport styles, curated clothing collections, and trending trainers. Unlock ​​Member Rewards, personalised ​​style advice, and easy shipping and returns, all in one seamless shopping app.

SHOP BETTER AS A MEMBER
Shop shoes, gear, sportswear, and streetwear. Kids’, women’s, or men’s clothing– check out the latest trainers and sport essentials from Nike and Jordan.
• Member Profile: View Activity, orders, and purchase history. Buy sportswear, sneakers, and accessories with the Nike online shopping app.
• Shopping App with Member Rewards: Celebrate big moments like your birthday & Member anniversary.
• Shop Exclusive Products: Shopping is better as a Member. Unlock exclusive sportswear and trainers from Jordan. Plus, get first dibs on new, upcoming, and seasonal releases dropping weekly. Shop Jordan, Air Max Dn8, P-6000, Nike Mercurial Football Boots, Vomero 18, and more.
• Jordan Mode: Shop the latest in Jordan clothing and sneakers, plus unlock exclusive content available only in Jordan Mode. Explore basketball shoes, seasonal women’s and men’s clothing collections, and sneaker releases from Jordan.
• Nike by You: Shop and customise iconic Nike shoes with curated colour palettes and premium materials that match your style.

SERVICES THAT CONNECT & GUIDE YOU
Finding your favourite clothing and sports essentials is easier with the Nike shopping app. Be the first to score the latest sneakers when you turn on notifications. Chat one-on-one with a Nike Expert for style advice on our sneakers and clothing.
• Notifications: Never miss a sneaker drop. Jordan drops, the latest apparel, athlete collaborations, events, and more are yours to discover when you turn on push notifications.
• Training & Coaching for all: Expert advice delivered by Nike athletes, coaches, and personal trainers. Receive training tips with your Nike community from wherever you are.
• Nike Experts: Get sport and style advice from our Nike experts. Chat in real-time for guidance on all things Nike and Jordan.
• Exclusive Nike Experiences: Find Member-only events in your city and attend IRL or online. Join your Nike community.
• Shop Online with Athlete Guidance: Get exclusive access to expert advice, personalised shopping recommendations, and Member-only perks.

STORIES THAT INSPIRE & INFORM YOU
Nike is more than a shopping app. Find in-depth stories spanning across sport and culture, delivered daily. Follow your favourite athletes, sports teams, and products to get the most from the Nike App.
• Member Home: Explore new, curated Nike stories, refreshed daily.
• Clothing Trends & Trainers: Find new ways to wear your favourite Nike styles, accessories, and footwear.
• Sportswear Collections: Trainers, football boots, accessories, sportswear, or workout clothing– learn what gear empowers the top Nike athletes.

Discover a shopping app with Member benefits and explore the latest from Nike and Jordan. Unlock exclusive apparel, style recommendations, in-person experiences, and the newest sneaker releases.

Download today and experience shopping as a Nike Member.

Clicks ClubCard and pharmacy convenience - now in your hands.
 
1. ClubCard on your phone
Keep enjoying your Feel Good Rewards – with a convenient digital ClubCard. 
One less plastic card in your wallet.
Simply scan your digital ClubCard at till point to earn points and spend your cashback.
Contact details out of date? Cut out the call centre, and simply update your profile on the app.
Not yet a ClubCard member? Simply download the app and register for ClubCard. It’s quick and easy.
 
2. Choose your savings
My ClubCard deals are personalised savings hand-picked JUST FOR YOU
Simply load the deals to your ClubCard on the app. Your savings will be applied when you use your ClubCard at the till in-store or when you shop online.

3. Check your ClubCard rewards
Track your cashback balance and points activity.
Grow your cashback even more at our partners - including Engen, Sorbet and The Body Shop.
 
4. Pharmacy convenience on your phone
Submit scripts - simply snap and send us a photo of your script.
Order script repeats - check the number of repeats remaining and simply order medication on the app.
We’ll send you an SMS when your order is ready for collection in 4 hours or less.
Save time - go straight to the pharmacy collection counter. 
Book a clinic appointment – choose your Clicks clinic, the day and time-slot most convenient for you.
 
5. Shop online 
Stay up to date with our latest promotions, and shop our widest range of products right on your phone.
Door to door delivery, FREE on orders over R450.
Collect your order at any Clicks store, FREE on orders over R150.
Order OTC medication online.
Access your shopping lists.
 
6. Find your closest Clicks store
Wherever you are, there is always a Clicks pharmacy near you.
Check store details such as address, trading hours and contact numbers.
Find a store that has exactly what you’re looking for, including in-store pharmacies and clinics.

New upgrade: Taobao English is now available in Malaysia, Singapore, Australia, Thailand, Canada, Cambodia, New Zealand, Hong Kong, Taiwan, Macau, Kazakhstan, Uzbekistan, Kyrgyzstan, Georgia and Mongolia!For other regions, stay tuned! We're working hard to upgrade for you, in the meantime, you can still shop in our Chinese interface!

Taobao (iPhone version) offers a convenient and engaging shopping experience, specifically designed for iPhone users.

As a leading e-commerce platform in China, Taobao provides an extensive selection of products, catering to the diverse and personalized needs of over 1 billion users. Known as the "Omnipotent Taobao", it stands as a trusted destination for quality and variety for its users. 

Every day, consumers from around the globe visit Taobao, eager to explore more products for their daily needs and keep up with the latest trends!Product Features:

1. Extensive Range of Global Brands
Discover thousands of brands and retailers, offering both Chinese and international products to consumers worldwide.

2. Diverse Offerings from Small and Medium-sized Vendors
Access tens of millions of unique products from small and medium-sized businesses, as well as innovative entrepreneurs, showcasing creative and thoughtfully designed items.

3. Safe and Seamless Shopping Experience
We've integrated local e-wallets and credit card payments in selected regions, along with cross-border direct shipping options. Some products also feature free shipping and/or local return services, ensuring a secure, joyful, and effortless shopping journey.

4. NEW English Interface Now Available!
The English interface is available in Malaysia, Singapore, Australia, Thailand, and Cambodia. Simply update your language settings. We're working hard to expand this feature to more regions soon!

5. Year-Round Promotional Activities
Take advantage of our numerous promotional events throughout the year. Enjoy discounted prices and exclusive platform benefits, making it easy to find high-quality products at even better prices.

Convenient online shopping for your favourite adidas apparel, shoes, and accessories is just a tap away. Find your favourite football boots, trainers, tracksuits, running shoes, and sports clothing with our robust search functionality and discover the styles you love. Filter by size, colour, price, sport, and more. Complete the simple and secure checkout process and your products will be on their way. adidas brings the ultimate sportswear and sneakers app to the palm of your hand.

Get more than just a clothing and shoe store. With adiClub, you get exclusive membership benefits. Earn points on purchases, access limited edition drops, and invitations to special events. Get access to exclusive celebrity collaborations with global superstars, from Lionel Messi to Kylie Jenner. Enjoy curated content, sportswear tips, and sporting inspiration all when you join adiClub.

Download adidas to enjoy online shopping with your favourite sports clothing, shoe drops, and exclusive content. All in or nothing – enhance your active lifestyle with adidas today.

THE ULTIMATE SPORTS CLOTHING & SHOE SHOP
- Trainers, sportswear, running shoes, football boots, and much more – adidas has you covered
- Access your favourite lifestyle fits with the adidas clothing and sneakers app
- Tracksuits, classic shoes, and more. Shop timeless adidas styles

ONLINE SHOPPING - MADE CONVENIENT
- adidas is the clothing and shoe store that brings you the tools to enhance your online shopping experience
- Browse and search the styles you love with helpful filters
- Seamlessly build your next outfit and check out in just a few taps

JOIN ADICLUB
- Earn points with adidas. Get rewarded for shopping, completing your profile, and leaving reviews.

MORE THAN JUST SHOPPING

All sports. All passions. All in. Download the adidas app today for an exclusive portal into unmatched online shopping and sportswear experiences.

Yaga is an online marketplace for new & preloved fashion. 

Buy safely from the wardrobes of people in your community or open your own shop and earn extra from items you no longer wear. Find unique second hand styles, save money and shop planet friendly! 

PROTECTED PAYMENTS:  

All in-app purchases are protected by Yaga. Your purchase payment will be deposited on Yaga's account and will ONLY be transferred to the Seller once you've confirmed receiving the item on the app.

SHOP: 

- Thousands of affordable finds from your favourite brands

- From the wardrobes of local Influencers & Bloggers 

- Truly unique vintage items 
 
Find items you like by using Search or browsing by categories. Save your favourite shops and be the first one to know when Sellers have added new items! 

HOW TO PURCHASE: 

You can purchase everything in-app by clicking "Buy". Delivery will be paid extra at checkout if not stated otherwise by the Seller. All in-app purchases are protected by Yaga. 

 
SELLING ON YAGA: 

- Take pictures of items you no longer need 

- Upload them to Yaga and add a description & price 

- Enjoy the extra income from your online shop 
 

Each shop owner can select a unique name, profile picture and a domain (URL) for their shop. Open your shop on Yaga and start your own small business.


Follow Yaga on Instagram and Facebook to stay in the loop with the latest trends and product updates.

Here are some of the features you can enjoy while using the new Dis-Chem app:

Dis-Chem DeliverD

Introducing Dis-Chem DeliverD, Dis-Chem’s trial On Demand 60 minute delivery service only available on the Dis-Chem app!

Message Centre

All your push notifications and accouncements are shown in the new message centre, giving you access to alerts whenever you need them.

Submit a Script

It’s now even easier to get your medication and repeat prescriptions with the all new delivery option.

Set Reminders

You can set reminders for yourself or your family members within the app to ensure that you (and your family members) never miss a dose of your medication.

Create shopping lists

Keep all your Dis-Chem to-buys listed conveniently in the Dis-Chem app to make shopping even easier. Create shopping lists you can personalise, save and share.

Dis-Chem Health

We’ve partnered with Kaelo and Centriq Insurance to deliver health products that meet the needs of many South Africans, giving them peace of mind knowing their day-to-day health is in good hands.

Virtual Dis-Chem Benefits Card

We’ve digitized your Dis-Chem Benefits Card for you so that you always have it when you need it. With your virtual card you can earn points every time you purchase in-store, view points (and their rand value) and even give back to the community by donating your Dis-Chem points to the Dis-Chem Foundation.

Bonus Cards

An added benefit is our virtual bonus card which lets you earn rewards for purchasing the products you love. Our app features a sticker book that will be virtually stamped every time you purchase a promotional product from one of our Dis-Chem stores. Once you’ve earned enough stickers you can choose your FREE gift from the list of our bonus products in-store.

The Dis-Chem app is free and available for anyone to use. Whether you’ve been a customer for a short while or a lifetime, you can enjoy the convenience of having your favourite pharmacy at your fingertips.

app_name: 拼多多 - 多多买菜，百亿补贴
developer: Shanghai Xunmeng Information Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
拼多多——多实惠，多乐趣

拼多多，社交新电商，更懂消费者的手机购物APP。8亿用户在此拼团，享受更高性价比的生活。和你的家人、朋友、邻居一起拼，品质商品更低价，包邮送到家，分享实惠，分享乐趣。

-多多买菜
1、依托拼多多全新的农产品上行物流体系，一键直达全国超过1000个农产品产区。
2、从田间到餐桌，避免中间环节损耗，百亿补贴加专项补贴，买菜更划算。
3、手机变成菜篮子，精选全国及海外农产区产地优质好货，覆盖各类生活必需品。
4、足不出户为家庭轻松选购次日生鲜，拿起手机选购，带着蔬果回家。

-更懂生活，好货不必贵
1、品类丰富：覆盖全品类品牌商品。小百货9.9包邮，轻松提升日常幸福感，品牌商品更低价，助你完成美好生活梦想。
2、百亿补贴：精选补贴全网热销品牌商品，直接降价，购物不必做算术题。
3、产地好货：源头好货产地直达，从农田到餐桌，从车间到小区，中国制造四十年产业经验为你敞开。
4、正品保障：假一赔十，品牌商品正品险，海关全程监督。

-分享乐趣，购物不孤单
1、发现好物，与好友共同分享，体验发现低价好货的乐趣。
2、和志同道合的好友拼单，或参与万人团，与8亿拼多多用户一起拼。拼团享受更低价，组团购物不孤单。
3、和朋友玩转小游戏。好朋友，就要一起栽种，一起收获。
4、为好友呈现你的真实点评，为真朋友说出真体验。

-产地直播，商家陪你看海
1、看数百万真实商家产地直播。看红薯从地里挖出，看菠萝的海，看一双鞋如何从生产线走到你面前。
2、市县长代言各产业带好货。市长县长精选本地产业带尖货，化身拼多多主播为你在线答疑。

-多多视频，有趣内容刷不停
1、魔法视频、超多滤镜、新奇特效、一键跟拍，出大片如此简单！
2、生活妙招、搞笑视频、美食菜谱、精彩直播，想看的这里都有！
3、高清画质、全屏沉浸、海量视频、智能推荐，多实惠更多乐趣！

因为倾听，所以更懂你
